desc: Boosts BB gauge enormously when dealing normal attacks and when attacked

dictionary.lore: There is a legend in Grand Gaia from long ago that tells of Nine Sacred Treasures which hold immense power. It is completely unknown where these treasures came from and who created them. However, when their names are mentioned, one can be certain that something amazing is bound to happen. The Sacred Blade Quatre Marinus is a name mentioned in the annals of the birth of the Imperial Capital of Randall, with an inscription next to it that reads "this sword should never see the light of day again."

name: Sacred Blade
